FAQ

What should I wear?

We are confident it will be hot and humid in June in East Tennessee. Please dress accordingly. No need for a tux or ball gown. Dress pants and a collared shirt or a casual dress will be just fine.

How do I get to the venue?

Take exit 407 off I-40 onto TN-66 towards Sevierville/Pigeon Forge. In 8.7 miles, turn right onto W Main Street. In 0.4 miles, turn left onto Hardin Lane. 805 Hardin Lane will be on your right in 1.2 miles. There is also a map on the details page.

What kind of shoes should I wear?

This is an outdoor wedding. It might not be the best place for stilettos.

Can I bring a date?

As much as we would love to have everyone, because of venue limitations, please only bring who was addressed on your invitation. If you have a question about this, feel free to contact Nathan or Sarah.

When is the RSVP deadline?

May 8th. And you can RSVP here!

What time should I arrive?

The ceremony is starting at 6pm. Arriving 15-20 minutes early will give you plenty of time to get a seat.

I have a pretty seriously allergy to [insert allergen here], can you accommodate me?

Yes! Get in touch with us ASAP, so we can make sure we keep any [insert allergen here] away from you!

Where should I park?

Parking is on the property. It will be marked and can be seen from the road.

Will food be served?

Yes! We will be having a taco bar with cupcakes and ice cream.

Will there be dancing?

Absolutely! Make sure to fill out the song request option when you RSVP.

What time will the reception end?

We plan on celebrating until about 10pm.

Can I take pictures?

Please no pictures during the ceremony, but take as many as you’d like during the reception. Feel free to tag us and use our snapchat filter and hashtag #OughtToBeAnOrick.

What if I have question that is not listed here?

Feel free to contact the bride or the groom.
